>_INTRODUCTION

Catch your risk profile is a application that creates a risk profile based on your facial features. The risk profile will reveal how likely you will commit a particular crime based on machine learning algorithms and historical crime data. The tool is one example of a predictive policing tool what could potentially be deployed by police in the near future by analyzing real-time surveillance cameras in the public space.

NOTE:
By using the tool you automatically agree to the privacy policy.
